meanings.definition: To be distant in time or space.
meanings.sent1: The old town yont the river was once bustling with activity.
meanings.sent2: I can see the mountains yont in the distance.
meanings.sent3: The spaceship traveled so fast that it ended up yont in the future!
meanings.sent4: Her dreams yont into the night, reaching for the stars.
meanings.sent5: The memories of childhood yont in the back of my mind.

meanings.sent1: The deadline for the project is yont now.
meanings.sent2: The ancient ruins lay yont the forest.
meanings.sent3: The secret treasure was hidden yont the old oak tree.
meanings.sent4: His wisdom yont that of his years.
meanings.sent5: The story yont the imagination of the listeners.

meanings.sent1: The island is yont across the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The stars twinkle yont in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The lost city was rumored to be yont in the desert.
meanings.sent4: His voice echoed yont in the empty hall.
meanings.sent5: The castle stood yont on the hill, overlooking the village.
